Title: Agents, apps, and acceleration: Helping software companies grow | BRK214
Description:
Agents and AI-powered apps are reshaping how software development companies deliver value. In this session, discover how to build smarter with AI-powered innovation, deliver faster with advanced developer tools, and scale confidently through a partner ecosystem designed for growth.

Delivered in a silent stage breakout.
